(atAngle angle: Angle, as: P.Type = P.self) -> P? where P : Plottable ``` ## Parameters - **angle**: The angle, relative to the plot center, where the 12 oâ€™clock position is interpreted as zero degrees, increasing clockwise. ## Return Value The data value at the given position.
